titles.title: Congratulating the National Football League champion Pittsburgh Steelers for winning Super Bowl XL and completing one of the greatest postseason runs in professional sports history.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Ms. Foxx moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 670.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Oxley objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 384 - 0, 10 Present (Roll no. 5).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/8/2006--Passed House without amendment. Congratulates the National Football League champion Pittsburgh Steelers for winning Super Bowl XL.
